# Field

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

This field component can be used to display the details of an entity. It is built around the label and the content of the field.

## Slots

| Slot                             | Description |
| -------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `"content Content of the field"` |             |
| `"label Label of the field"`     |             |
